simplified: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福
traditional: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福
pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2

definitions.tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you: fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity (idiom); sth unexpected may happen at any moment;
